author: Jessica Scott-Reid, Sentient
description:
Remember last November, when Elon Musk joined Joe Rogan on his podcast, and the two dismissed meat production as “irrelevant” to the climate crisis? Or last December, when fellow podcaster Russell Brand, once a committed vegan for ethical and environmental reasons, posted about eating steak at Mar-a-Lago with President-elect Trump? New research from Yale finds […]

The post Joe Rogan and Other Top Podcasts Spread Climate Disinfo, Research Finds appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Joe Rogan and Other Top Podcasts Spread Climate Disinfo, Research Finds
